column1: b'This week\xe2\x80\x99s Australia Letter, written and delivered from inside a country pub.'

column1: b"At his stand-up desk in a Silicon Valley office complex, Guido Nunez-Mujica's phone buzzes nonstop as he tries in vain to concentrate on his work. The text messages are from 6,000 miles away in Santiago, Chile, where he's helping resettle a group ..."
column3: b'US Tech Worker Helps Fellow Venezuelans Flee Economic Mayhem'
